title: Julie's Chicken Salad
directions: In a large bowl toss together the chicken, raisins, celery and grapes. Fold in the avocado and the apple. Mix in the mayonnaise and lemon juice. Chill.
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - boiled
½ cup walnuts, toasted and chopped
1  tart apple - peeled, cored and chopped
